title: 各位玩mc时喜欢边听音乐边玩吗?
author: 迷惘の行者
txt_content: 或者一边追剧或者专心玩mc

replies.author: 离心丶
replies.txt_content: 要加音乐

replies.author: 狐狸的世界
replies.txt_content: 我呢喜欢听原生背景音乐

replies.author: 零x
replies.txt_content: 不喜欢，这个话题我以前见人发过，说实话

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content: 建筑不需要东西

replies.author: ranick
replies.txt_content: 玩MC静音233

replies.author: 仙仙仙猪丶
replies.txt_content: 喜欢听原版自带的

replies.author: StreamReader
replies.txt_content:
没错，而且是听其他游戏的BGM

replies.author: kuangwangwuyu
replies.txt_content: 还行吧，有些时候会

replies.author: Summer621621
replies.txt_content: 爱的呢，手机看B站，电脑玩mc，把mc原版的音乐关掉

replies.author: xixi1798529692
replies.txt_content: 我通常会把MC的背景音乐关掉，听自己的音乐

replies.author: 智乃offical
replies.txt_content: 女主播原声算不算（指钉钉）

replies.author: Tzi_dada
replies.txt_content: 我边看视频边玩 玩的是rpg服务器在无聊的刷怪23333

replies.author: 天空的大楼
replies.txt_content: 有时候我会边听音乐，边玩mc。
感觉不开音乐玩的有点无聊

replies.author: Deith
replies.txt_content: 听来听去最舒服的还是mc自带的轻音乐= =

replies.author: 怒涛·沧岚
replies.txt_content: 我放C418的bgm

replies.author: zhayu1
replies.txt_content: 不是很喜欢变听边玩

replies.author: src_resources
replies.txt_content: 原版BGM听腻了，想找个好的游戏时音乐又找不到，干脆就静音了。

replies.author: pt66
replies.txt_content: 感觉mc的音乐挺舒缓身心的。

replies.author: crylrz
replies.txt_content: 喜欢，千本樱  or  summer
